Articles.Content:
I can't seem to figure out why the mercury Pod in the FASA pack doesn't have thermal effects? The bottom lights up nice an redish orange but no reentry effects which brings me back to reality every time when entering any atmosphere  not a game breaker but I wish I could get this to work.

 

Update: OK so ModuleManager physics is set in the alt+f12 menu and not physics.cfg? How can I make physics.cfg the default?

Edited December 12, 2015 by Berlin
Typo
